column4: My windows comp doesn't see my ubuntu comp over the network. Lil' help?
do you have an firewall installed on your windows pc?
I have done this so many times after installs and every time it is annoying
my last ubuntu install was working
you'll should see your windows pc in your places->network servers by default.
Lynoure I can see the windows comp in that location, but from the windows comp when I enter the ubuntu comp's address (\\pikapika\) it asks me for a password and username
you'll need to edit smb.conf if you want anonymous access
what is the location of the file?
I never get anywhere with thoes faqs
What setting do I have to change to make it anonmys
but I can't tell you what to change, never wanted anonymous access trough samba
man smb.conf could help you maybe
